package htc.sol.beginers.excercise;

public class Exc2 {
	private int num;
	private char character;
	private float smalldec;
	private long longnum;
	private String value;
	private double bigdec;
	
	
	public Exc2() {
	/*	return ("successful initialization");*/
/*		super();*/
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public int getNum() {
		return num;
	}
	public void setNum(int num) {
		this.num = num;
	}
	public char getCharacter() {
		return character;
	}
	public void setCharacter(char character) {
		this.character = character;
	}
	public float getSmalldec() {
		return smalldec;
	}
	public void setSmalldec(float smalldec) {
		this.smalldec = smalldec;
	}
	public long getLongnum() {
		return longnum;
	}
	public void setLongnum(long longnum) {
		this.longnum = longnum;
	}
	public String getValue() {
		return value;
	}
	public void setValue(String value) {
		this.value = value;
	}
	public double getBigdec() {
		return bigdec;
	}
	public void setBigdec(double bigdec) {
		this.bigdec = bigdec;
	}
}
